original: a'arya kha di ra ba n'i t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: a'arya kha di ra ba n'i t'a r'a s'a dha nam /

original: 'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: 'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sngon ma bzhin du stong pha nyid mthar thug pa bsgoms nas t'am gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: sngon ma bzhin du stong pha nyid mthar thug pa bsgoms nas t'am gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las /
translated: As before, having meditated on the culmination of emptiness, from the complete transformation of the seed syllable tāṃ,

original: autpa la'i lte bar t'am gi sa bon no //
analyzed: autpa la'i lte bar t'am gi sa bon no //
translated: in the center of a lotus is the seed syllable tāṃ.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog ljang gu don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog ljang gu don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa /
translated: From its complete transformation, [one becomes] green, with Amoghasiddhi as the head ornament,

original: mchog sbyin dang autpa la ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: mchog sbyin dang autpa la ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa'o //
translated: granting boons and holding an utpala in the right and left hands.

original: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'od zer can dang / ral pa gcig ma dag g-yas dang / g-yon gyi phyogs char gnas pa /
analyzed: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'od zer can dang / ral pa gcig ma dag g-yas dang / g-yon gyi phyogs char gnas pa /
translated: Aśoka-Marīcī and Ekajaṭī are located in the right and left directions,

original: gzhon nu mdzes shing rgyan dang ldan ma /
analyzed: gzhon nu mdzes shing rgyan dang ldan ma /

original: seng ldeng gi nags su sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi don byed par bsams la ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu byas te /
analyzed: seng ldeng gi nags su sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi don byed par bsams la ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu byas te /
translated: Having imagined that you are accomplishing the welfare of various sentient beings in the forest of Khadira, together with the awareness being,

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags bzlas la /
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags bzlas la /
translated: recite the mantra Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā.

original: de nyid kyi yid kyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi yid kyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
translated: Then, with that very mind, remain in whatever way is comfortable.

original: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of Khadira Forest Tārā is complete.

original: // / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o//
analyzed: // / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o//
translated: This was taught by the perfect Buddha.
